alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 8:54AM CST until February 09 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Sunday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.0 feet on 01/01/1984. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
